heading: HR02049
0: A RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST POSSIBLE TERMS THE BOMB ATTACK AT A VAN AT AN ARMY CHECKPOINT IN LAMITAN CITY, BASILAN ON JULY 31, 2018 KILLING ELEVEN PEOPLE INCLUDING A  ONE-YEAR OLD CHILD AND URGING THE GOVERNMENT TO BRING TO JUSTICE THE PERPETRATORS OF SUCH DASTARDLY ACT
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY since 2018-08-07
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02049
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST POSSIBLE TERMS THE BOMB ATTACK AT A VAN AT AN ARMY CHECKPOINT IN LAMITAN CITY, BASILAN ON JULY 31, 2018 KILLING ELEVEN PEOPLE INCLUDING A ONE-YEAR OLD CHILD AND URGING THE GOVERNMENT TO BRING TO JUSTICE THE PERPETRATORS OF SUCH DASTARDLY ACT
